function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration of environmental monitoring in public health surveillance systems","Impact":"Improved surveillance and early detection of disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement a robust environmental monitoring and surveillance system, including serological and entomological surveillance","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring tools, serological testing equipment, entomological surveillance devices","People":"Public health authorities, researchers, environmental monitoring agencies","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"High risk values for WNV infection in specific regions","Impact":"Increased likelihood of WNV transmission and disease outbreaks in these regions","Mitigation":"Implement targeted mosquito control measures, public health awareness campaigns, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Mosquito control technologies, vaccination technologies, public health communication tools","People":"Residents of high-risk regions, public health authorities, travelers to high-risk regions","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, local communities"},{"Description":"Dengue dispersal through air traffic","Impact":"Global spread of dengue virus to new regions via infected travelers","Mitigation":"Implement screening measures at airports, public health education for travelers, and mosquito control programs in high-risk areas","Technologies":"Airport screening technologies, mosquito control technologies, public health education materials","People":"Air travelers, residents of high-risk areas, public health authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, airport authorities, public health organizations"}]}
